long_description: Lightweight, tough and compact, the ingenious Quantum boat cart makes transporting your watercraft to and from the water a pleasure. Flexible plastic cradle adapts to a variety of stern shapes for effective, gentle bracing while towing over uneven ground. Dual nylon webbing straps wrap boat hull to secure it to the cart; longer strap features a rubber-coated hook for cockpit anchoring. Quick-release pin on axles allows fast breakdown of wheels and cart for compact storage; fits in most boat hulls and cargo hatches. Lightweight design uses corrosion-resistant materials for lasting service.
short_description: Lightweight, tough and compact, the ingenious Quantum boat cart makes transporting your watercraft to and from the water a pleasure.
